means: 扁果菊（一种菊科（扁果菊属黄眼草目） 灌木，原产于墨西哥和美国西南部，有灰色的叶子和艳丽的花头以及黄色的伞形花序 ）

means.word_mean: 1. fragrant rounded shrub of southwestern United States and adjacent Mexico having brittle stems and small crowded blue-green leaves and yellow flowers; produces a resin used in incense and varnish and in folk medicine
